Topic.Title: How do you change the original name of your gamebook?

Posts.EditableText: I am new and don't know if there is an obvious answer to this that I couldn't find, but when I first made a game book, it told me to pick a name so I did one at random, and although I changed the name and it shows up when you play it, when I go to the my games page, it says the original name that I don't want. Please help! I spent a lot of time on this!
Posts.HTML: I am new and don't know if there is an obvious answer to this that I couldn't find, but when I first made a game book, it told me to pick a name so I did one at random, and although I changed the name and it shows up when you play it, when I go to the my games page, it says the original name that I don't want. Please help! I spent a lot of time on this!

Posts.EditableText: If you're signed in, from the homepage click 'create' then under 'my games' there's an option to edit lisings there by clicking 'published'.
Posts.HTML: If you're signed in, from the homepage click 'create' then under 'my games' there's an option to edit lisings there by clicking 'published'.

Posts.EditableText: If it's not published, the current name will be picked up when you publish. Your editor dashboard will still show the old name, but only you see this.
Posts.HTML: If it's not published, the current name will be picked up when you publish. Your editor dashboard will still show the old name, but only you see this.
